item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Talk about a flight from hell: why it took Grit MP Andrews 62 hours to fly back to ...
Liberal MP Scott Andrews headed back to his Avalon, Nfld., riding recently, but this time it took five attempts, 62 hours, four flights, three cities, and two St. John's fly-overs before he got home. Photograph courtesy of Scott Andrews. MP life: Grit MP Scott Andrews, pictured at a riding event, said ... Peter O'Brien, his wife, Liberal MP Carolyn Bennett and Mr. Coates. The Hill Times photograph by Jake Wright. NDP MPs Pierre Nantel and Olivia Chow, CBC's Jian Ghomeshi and Canadian Heritage Minister James Moore.
